data.text: Frederick County, Maryland Marriage Licenses - 1865-1886 Transcribed by Dorinda Davis Shepley of MidMdRoots.com There are 7,238 marriages listed here. One volume is listed by grooom's name and the other is listed by bride's name. If the marriage date wasn't provided, the recorded date (after the marriage) is notated in the record. Abbreviations used: wid for widow/widower; Baltimore and Frederick are for the city or town. County Abbreviations: AC = Allegany County AAC = Anne Arundel County BC = Baltimore County CC = Carroll County DC = District of Columbia FC = Frederick County GC = Garrett County HC = Howard County MC = Montgomery County PGC = Prince George's County WC = Washington County Bride Groom Occupation / Residence Marr Date Minister - Location of Marriage Pg (unknown) - bride's name, etc not listed THOM, S.
